## Pages

### Home
https://example.com
Design your perfect virtual companion with our free AI character creation platform. Customize personalities, traits, and interactions instantly.

https://example.com/studio
Unleash your creativity in our studio. Craft personalized AI boyfriends with unique traits, personalities, and stories using advanced character tools.

https://example.com/showcase
Browse stunning AI characters crafted by our community. Get inspired by unique virtual companions and discover endless customization possibilities.
